voter_description_title.title: I hereby declare that (check one of the following)

currently_registered_in_residence.title: I am a duly qualified voter who is currently registered to vote in this town/ward

need_registration_materials.title: am absent from the town/city where I am domiciled and will be until after the next election, or I am unable to register in person due to a disability, and request that the forms necessary for absentee voter registration be sent to me with the absentee ballot.

excuses_title.title: I will be entitled to vote by absentee ballot because (check one of the following)

excuses_title_weather.title: For use only on the Monday immediately prior to the election: I cannot appear at my polling place on election day because the National Weather Service has issued a winter storm warning, blizzard warning, or ice storm warning for election day applicable to my city, town, or unincorporated place and either (check one):

election_type_request_title.title: III.	I am requesting an official absentee ballot for the following election (check only one)

election_type_description.title: Required for Primary Elections:  I am a member of, or I am now declaring my affiliation with a party and I am requesting a ballot for that party’s primary (check only one):

primary_election_checkbox.title: State Primary Election to be held on September 8, 2020. If yes, select Party Affiliation below

general_election_checkbox.title: State General Election to be held on November 3, 2020

mailing_info_description.title: This is the address where your ballot will be mailed

witness_information_title.title: I attest that I assisted the applicant in executing this form because he/she has a disability.

witness_information_description.title: Any person who witnesses and assists a voter with a disability in executing this form shall print and sign his or her name in the space provided on the application form.
